thag4.4:1.1_0: Damn you mortal frame, you stink!
thag4.4:1.2_0: You’re on Māra’s side, you ooze!
thag4.4:1.3_0: O body, you have nine streams
thag4.4:2.1_0: Don’t think much of mortal frames;
thag4.4:2.3_0: They’re not even aroused by heaven,
thag4.4:3.1_0: But those who are stupid fools,
thag4.4:3.2_0: with bad advisors, shrouded in delusion,
thag4.4:3.3_0: that kind of person is aroused by bodies,
thag4.4:3.4_0: when Māra has laid down the snare.
thag4.4:4.3_0: such people are not aroused by bodies,
thag4.4:4.4_0: they’ve cut the strings, they’re no longer bound.
